channel.title: Into Thin Air on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Into Thin Air on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The iPhone 17 Air Could Use a Silicon-Carbon Battery. What Is It?
item.description: Phones with thinner designs are enjoying a moment. But while thin phones usually suffer poor battery life, batteries with silicon-carbon anodes are helping circumvent that notion.
